tools.name: three_create_mesh
tools.description: 创建一个网格对象（几何体+材质）。Create a mesh object (geometry + material).

geometryId.description: 几何体ID（由几何体创建工具返回）。Geometry ID (returned by geometry creation tools).

materialId.description: 材质ID（由材质创建工具返回）。Material ID (returned by material creation tools).

position.description: 对象位置 {x, y, z}。Object position {x, y, z}.

rotation.description: 对象旋转（弧度）{x, y, z}。Object rotation in radians {x, y, z}.

scale.description: 对象缩放 {x, y, z}。Object scale {x, y, z}.

visible.description: 对象是否可见。Whether the object is visible.

tools.name: three_create_line
tools.description: 创建线对象。Create a line object.

geometryId.description: 几何体ID（应使用BufferGeometry）。Geometry ID (should use BufferGeometry).

materialId.description: 材质ID（应使用LineBasicMaterial或LineDashedMaterial）。Material ID (should use LineBasicMaterial or LineDashedMaterial).

position.description: 对象位置 {x, y, z}。Object position {x, y, z}.

tools.name: three_create_points
tools.description: 创建点对象。Create a points object.

materialId.description: 材质ID（应使用PointsMaterial）。Material ID (should use PointsMaterial).

position.description: 对象位置 {x, y, z}。Object position {x, y, z}.

tools.name: three_set_object_position
tools.description: 设置对象的位置。Set the position of an object.

position.description: 新位置 {x, y, z}。New position {x, y, z}.

tools.name: three_set_object_rotation
tools.description: 设置对象的旋转（使用欧拉角，单位：弧度）。Set the rotation of an object (using Euler angles in radians).

rotation.description: 新旋转 {x, y, z}（弧度）。New rotation {x, y, z} in radians.

tools.name: three_set_object_scale
tools.description: 设置对象的缩放。Set the scale of an object.

scale.description: 新缩放 {x, y, z}。New scale {x, y, z}.

tools.name: three_get_object_info
tools.description: 获取对象的详细信息。Get detailed information about an object.

tools.name: three_clone_object
tools.description: 克隆对象（创建对象的副本）。Clone an object (create a copy of the object).

objectId.description: 要克隆的对象ID。Object ID to clone.

recursive.description: 是否递归克隆子对象。Whether to recursively clone child objects.

tools.name: three_dispose_object
tools.description: 释放对象资源（释放几何体和材质的内存）。Dispose object resources (free memory for geometry and material).

objectId.description: 要释放的对象ID。Object ID to dispose.
